Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: The process is complex, but I need to break it down into a process tree using the operators: sequence (->), exclusive choice (X), parallel (+), and loop (*).

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Breaking down the process involves creating a process tree with operators: sequence (->), exclusive choice (X), parallel (+), and loop (*). The goal is to outline a high-level structure to manage the complexity of the task systematically.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: The process starts with a sequence: Arrival (A) -> Registration (RG) -> Intake Assessment (IA). Then, it continues with Triage Interview (TI) -> Triage Classification (TC). Next, there's an exclusive choice (X) between Comprehensive ECG (CE) or Full Blood Panel (FBP). If results are abnormal, a loop begins: Specialist Consultation (SC) -> choice between Targeted Medication (TM) or Specialized Physical Therapy (SPT) -> choice between Follow-up ECG (FCE) or Follow-up Blood Analysis (FBA), repeating until results normalize.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: The loop involves evaluating initial diagnostic results and, if abnormal, cycling through consultations and treatments. It includes re-diagnostic steps like Follow-up ECG or Blood Analysis to check for normality.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: After the loop, parallel processes occur: Advanced Imaging (AI) and Nutritional Counseling (NC). The process ends with Follow-up Appointment Scheduling (FAS) -> Detailed Discharge Instructions (DDI), followed by parallel tasks: Billing (BL), Insurance Claims Processing (ICP), and Medical Records Finalization (MRF).

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: The loop starts if initial diagnostics (CE or FBP) show abnormal results, involving Specialist Consultation (SC) followed by exclusive choices: Targeted Medication (TM) or Specialized Physical Therapy (SPT). After treatment, a re-diagnostic test (Follow-up ECG or Blood Analysis) occurs, and if still abnormal, the loop repeats until results normalize. The process tree notation uses * (A, B), where A is the diagnostic evaluation, and B includes treatment and re-diagnostic steps. The loop structure is * (initial check, SC -> X(TM, SPT) -> X(FCE, FBA)), repeating the treatment and re-diagnostic cycle if needed. This ensures systematic management of abnormal results, aligning with the goal of reaching normal outcomes.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: The loop begins after initial diagnostics if results are abnormal, executing Specialist Consultation (SC) -> choice between Targeted Medication (TM) or Specialized Physical Therapy (SPT) -> choice between Follow-up ECG (FCE) or Blood Analysis (FBA). It repeats this cycle (loop body) if results remain abnormal, with the exit condition implicit in process trees, continuing until normalization.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: After the loop (whether entered or not), parallel processes occur: Advanced Imaging (AI) and Nutritional Counseling (NC). The process then proceeds to Follow-up Appointment Scheduling (FAS) -> Detailed Discharge Instructions (DDI), followed by parallel tasks: Billing (BL), Insurance Claims Processing (ICP), and Medical Records Finalization (MRF), which can be modeled as nested parallel operations like + (BL, + (ICP, MRF)).

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: The process tree is constructed using the ProcessTree class, starting with a root node as a sequence operator to reflect the mostly sequential flow. Root children include steps like A, RG, IA, TI, TC, and subtrees for diagnostic choices and loops, ensuring hierarchical structure.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: The initial sequence (A -> RG -> IA -> TI -> TC -> X(CE, FBP)) is built as a subtree with each node parented to a sequence operator. Leaves like A and RG are created with labels and parent links, ensuring correct tree connectivity for later processing.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE

Each choice is modeled with an XOR operator, ensuring only one option is selected, with children nodes parented accordingly for tree structure.

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: The loop is constructed using a LOOP operator, with a silent tau node (label=None) representing the initial diagnostic check before repeating the loop body if results are abnormal. This aligns with the process tree is implicit exit condition, ensuring the cycle continues until normalization.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Silent steps, like tau, are represented with ProcessTree nodes having no operator and label=None. These nodes mark implicit process transitions, such as initial diagnostic checks before loops.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Advanced parallel processes, like AI and NC, use a PARALLEL operator with each activity parented to it. Final parallel tasks, including BL, ICP, and MRF, are similarly structured under another PARALLEL operator.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE

Name: Validation - PE
